# =============== #
# Unity.gitignore #
# =============== #

# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore user-specific and system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity-generated folders
Library/
Temp/
Obj/
Build/
Builds/
Logs/
MemoryCaptures/

# Unity cache
*.pidb
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.tmproj
*.svd

# Autogenerated VS/JetBrains Rider project files
ExportedObj/
*.booproj
*.pidb.meta

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Build and packaging
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage

# Environment files
.env

# Ignore Lightmap cache
LightmapSnapshot*

# PlasticSCM
.PlasticSCM/

# JetBrains Rider Unity plugin
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Collaborate files
.collab/

# Cache
*/AssetImportState

# Ignore custom folders (optional)
# MyCustomBuilds/
